mapper.sql: a.log_nr_ AS "logNr", a.type_ AS "type", a.proc_def_id_ AS "procDefId", a.proc_inst_id_ AS "procInstId", a.execution_id_ AS "executionId", a.task_id_ AS "taskId", a.time_stamp_ AS "timeStamp", a.user_id_ AS "user.id", a.data_ AS "data", a.lock_owner_ AS "lockOwner", a.lock_time_ AS "lockTime", a.is_processed_ AS "isProcessed", u8.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u8 ON u8.id = a.user_id_
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_evt_log( log_nr_, type_, proc_def_id_, proc_inst_id_, execution_id_, task_id_, time_stamp_, user_id_, data_, lock_owner_, lock_time_, is_processed_ ) VALUES ( #{logNr}, #{type}, #{procDefId}, #{procInstId}, #{executionId}, #{taskId}, #{timeStamp}, #{user.id}, #{data}, #{lockOwner}, #{lockTime}, #{isProcessed} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_evt_log SET log_nr_ = #{logNr}, type_ = #{type}, proc_def_id_ = #{procDefId}, proc_inst_id_ = #{procInstId}, execution_id_ = #{executionId}, task_id_ = #{taskId}, time_stamp_ = #{timeStamp}, user_id_ = #{user.id}, data_ = #{data}, lock_owner_ = #{lockOwner}, lock_time_ = #{lockTime}, is_processed_ = #{isProcessed} WHERE id = #{id}
